amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: TITLE VI--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS SEC. 601. Appropriations made in this Act are hereby reduced in the amount of $276,330,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce appropriations in the bill by $276,330,000 (or 1 percent).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 254 (Roll no. 571).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Price (GA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Price (GA) amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 254 (Roll no. 571).
